name: Pong 2.0
description: So for a project we had to take someones idea and improve on it. So I chose pong and added power ups. It can be played with 2 people with player one using w and s and player 2 using up and down arrows. I originally was using music from my friends band From Ashes to New, but did not have consent from them to use it as they never got back to me, so I removed it. But this game was well liked by the class even if the score sometimes did not load or did not count correctly. I am not a coder and this was my best attempt.
